function.name: FadeText
function.desc: Sets the titling text on the screen and fades it in

param.name: SubTitle3
param.desc: SubTitle 3 (last subtitle, spaced separate from subtitle 1 and 2)

param.name: FadeTime
param.desc: Fade-in time in seconds for each title field

param.name: FadeStaggerTime
param.desc: Time in seconds to stagger the delay for fading in each title field

param.name: FadeOutTime
param.desc: Fade-out time in seconds for each title field

param.name: FadeOutStaggerTime
param.desc: Time in seconds to stagger the delay for fading out each title field

event.name: OnFadeInComplete
event.desc: Event fired when the SetText fade-in animation has completed

event.name: OnFadeOutComplete
event.desc: Event fired when the FadeOut animation has completed
